name: Stratego (itch) (SourPlanes Games)
description:
Stratego

The game is the digital version of the homonym board game.

Two players battle each other on a 10x10 board trying to capture the opponent's flag. Before the actual game, players take turn placing their units. These remain unknown to the opponent and will only be revealed upon entering an enemy occupied position. The key to victory is to remember where the enemy units are throughout the game.

On development:

  • Linux & MacOs build
  • AI

Report a bug at:   sourplanesgames@gmail.com
